Posts.Content: Since taking arimadex for the past 4 months, i find that i am experiencing a leaky bradder. I don't know if this is caused by the arimadex, but i never had that before. Also began getting arithic condition in my hands and horrible aches all over. Has anyone had the leaky bladder issue while on this med. Â
Posts.Title: SIDE EFFECTS FROM ARIMADEX
